video.title: Jane the Virgin
video.synopsis: After vowing to remain chaste until marriage, Jane Villanueva learns she's pregnant due to a medical slip-up and has to rethink her future.

episodes.synopsis: The life of a pious, hardworking Latina woman is turned upside down when a doctor visit reveals she was artificially inseminated by accident.
episodes.title: Chapter One: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: When her baby daddy's wild past comes to light, Jane chooses to keep working in the hotel he manages to see if he and his wife would be good parents.
episodes.title: Chapter Two

episodes.synopsis: Jane decides there is no point in clinging to her virginity and plans a romantic encounter with Michael, despite her budding feelings for Rafael.
episodes.title: Chapter Three

episodes.synopsis: Jane's plan to squelch her feelings for Rafael backfires. Xo risks her relationship with her daughter by revealing the truth about Jane's father.
episodes.title: Chapter Four

episodes.synopsis: Jane finds herself in a pickle when Michael vows his loyalty and Rafael comes clean about his plans for the baby. Jane decides to get to know her dad.
episodes.title: Chapter Five

episodes.synopsis: Jane drifts away from Michael and toward Rafael. As she gets closer to her father, she must cope with his nasty stepdaughters, who attend her school.
episodes.title: Chapter Six

episodes.synopsis: Jane's electrifying kiss with Rafael prompts her to be a bit more reckless. Petra plots to take down Rafael. Xo and Rogelio end up on a double date.
episodes.title: Chapter Seven

episodes.synopsis: Rafael returns worse for the wear after an unsuccessful search for his missing sister, and Jane must decide whether to continue with the relationship.
episodes.title: Chapter Eight

episodes.synopsis: A sonogram appointment offers a window into Jane and Rafael's different philosophies on parenting. Petra makes a play for the baby.
episodes.title: Chapter Nine

episodes.synopsis: A hurricane causes a lockdown at the hotel, where a reinstated Rafael is forced to make cuts that put Jane in a bind. Alba suffers serious injuries.
episodes.title: Chapter Ten

episodes.synopsis: Jane must decide between taking a permanent teaching position at the school and accepting a writing internship at Rogelio's telenovela.
episodes.title: Chapter Eleven

episodes.synopsis: Jane and Rafael struggle to deal with various challenges from Luisa and Petra. Meanwhile, Jane gets a big break that may be too good to be true.
episodes.title: Chapter Twelve

episodes.synopsis: A pregnancy checkup takes an unexpected turn, forcing Jane to make a difficult choice and casting a shadow over her graduation.
episodes.title: Chapter Thirteen

episodes.synopsis: With Emilio still missing and the amnio results not expected for another week, Jane and Rafael try to go about their normal lives.
episodes.title: Chapter Fourteen

episodes.synopsis: Jane and Rafael revisit the issue of moving in together. Meanwhile, Jane learns that her literary idol is staying at the Marbella.
episodes.title: Chapter Fifteen

episodes.synopsis: While enjoying Miami's annual Carnaval, Jane and Rafael try to navigate the changing course of their relationship. Jane alienates her writing group.
episodes.title: Chapter Sixteen

episodes.synopsis: Daunted by impending motherhood, Jane rejects Xo's advice and worries about Rafael's fathering skills, especially when he reacts to a work crisis.
episodes.title: Chapter Seventeen

episodes.synopsis: Jane harbors doubts about Rafael and their future but sacrifices to help him at work. Rafael's estranged mother reveals a heartbreaking secret.
episodes.title: Chapter Eighteen

episodes.synopsis: When Rafael suddenly withdraws from Jane, she fights to save their troubled romance. Meanwhile, they must play the happy couple at their baby shower.
episodes.title: Chapter Nineteen

episodes.synopsis: In the aftermath of the breakup, Jane tries to focus on what is best for the baby and figure out how to co-parent with the man who broke her heart.
episodes.title: Chapter Twenty

episodes.synopsis: Jane grapples with her choice to seek sole custody of her child. Her school reunion highlights the gap between the future she envisioned and her life.
episodes.title: Chapter Twenty-One

episodes.synopsis: Jane must set all issues aside, from her mother's absence to grad school applications to man problems, because the arrival of her baby is at hand.
episodes.title: Chapter Twenty-Two
